SELECT cm_idx, cm_nick, title, content, postdate, visitcount FROM tb_comm WHERE cm_idx = #{cmIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_comm(cm_id, cm_nick, title, content, postdate) VALUES (#{cmId}, #{cmNick}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW())
